I ____ the ____ class ____ math, but I'm not ____ good ____ it, so I'm worried I might ____. I will also take various classes next year, but no more art!
data.partBlankContent: I take five classes at night school right now, and I'm really busy. My le___ favorite cl___ is a__ class. I ju__ don't li__ painting a__ drawing. I th___ the be__ class i_ math, but I'm not ve__ good a_ it, so I'm worried I might fa__. I will also take various classes next year, but no more art!
data.fullContent: I take five classes at night school right now, and I'm really busy. My least favorite class is art class. I just don't like painting and drawing. I think the best class is math, but I'm not very good at it, so I'm worried I might fail. I will also take various classes next year, but no more art!
data.answer: 我现在在夜校上五节课，我真的很忙。我最不喜欢的课是艺术课。我只是不喜欢画画。我认为最好的课是数学，但是我不是很擅长，所以我担心我可能会不及格。明年我也会修各种课程，但不再是艺术了!
